headers.value: default-src 'self'; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https://webforms.pipedrive.com; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https://webforms.pipedrive.com; img-src 'self' data: https://* https://webforms.pipedrive.com; font-src 'self' https://webforms.pipedrive.com; connect-src 'self' https://webforms.pipedrive.com; media-src 'self' https://storage.googleapis.com; object-src 'none'; frame-src 'self' https://webforms.pipedrive.com; worker-src 'self'; frame-ancestors 'self'; form-action 'self' https://webforms.pipedrive.com; upgrade-insecure-requests; block-all-mixed-content;
